project_context.target_audience: Internal Agency Employees (Performance Marketers, HR, Execs)

rules: Use 'Rubik' for all text-2xl and larger.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for financial data, IDs, and dates.
Headings must use tight tracking (-0.02em or -0.03em).
Uppercase labels must use wide tracking (0.1em).

background.description: Deepest Obsidian Blue - Main App Background

primary.description: Profitcast Teal - Primary Actions, Active States

secondary.description: Mint Green - Success, Growth Metrics, Accents

cards.style: Flat, No Shadow (or subtle glow), 1px Border

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly on headers. backdrop-blur-xl bg-background/80
visual_enhancers.gradients: Use gradients ONLY for text clips or subtle glows. NO gradient backgrounds for cards.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Glow effects instead of drop shadows. shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(var(--primary),0.15)]

assets.icons: Lucide React (Default). Use thin strokes (stroke-width={1.5}) for elegance.

images.logo: Use text 'SIGNAL' in Rubik Bold if no SVG provided.
images.avatars: Use generic gradients or initials if no user image.

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts imports to /app/frontend/public/index.html or /app/frontend/src/index.css immediately.
CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to include 'font-rubik', 'font-inter', and 'font-mono' (JetBrains).
UPDATE CSS VARIABLES: Replace the contents of @layer base in index.css with the HSL values provided in the colors section. FORCE DARK MODE variables to be the default.
COMPONENT OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components, override the default 'radius' to 0.5rem and 'border' colors to be subtle.
STRICT ADHERENCE: Do not use white backgrounds. Everything must be #02040A or #09090B.
DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid attributes to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards) for testing.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use gradients for main backgrounds, only solid #02040A.
Use JetBrains Mono for all numbers, prices, and IDs.
Ensure 'Sign In' button has the glow effect defined in components.buttons.primary.
Sidebar must be fixed on the left.
Dashboard cards must use the 'Bento' grid layout.
Never use 'Inter' for headings. Use Rubik.
